result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher W Olson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Vehicle Operator Flee/Elude Officer, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.04(3).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Christopher W Olson in court with attorney Peter M Wolff.  Mary Caitlin Brejcha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 2.  Court finds defendant guilty.
Counts 1 and 3 are dismissed and read in.  
  The Defendant was sentenced to the following:

IMPOSED AND STAYED SENTENCE OF:   

1 YEAR HUBER, w/Standard Release Conditions (CREDIT - 88 days);

TERM OF PROBATION:  2 YEAR(S);

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:  
*AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended;
*Absolute Sobriety;  Random U.A.'s ; 
*No Use or Possession of alcohol, illegal controlled substance or drug paraphernalia.
*Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
*DNA sample to be provided and pay costs associated.
*Mental Heath evaluation and treatment deemed appropriate.
*Sign any releases of information as required by agent.
*D/L Revocation of 6 months.
*Not to drive or operate a motor vehicle unless properly licensed.

RESTITUTION:  Zero. 

COURT COSTS:  $268 (bail to be applied)

DNA SURCHARGE:  $250 (bail to be applied, any remaining bail to be refunded to poster).

CONDITION TIME: 30, STAYED; non-working hours, to be used at agent's discretion.

Felony warnings, voting rights and firearms warnings given.
Wisconsin Community Service compliance letter received and filed.
Filed by the State. Witness list attached.
